The automaker found itself not just making products to protect workers, but giving others the means to follow suit.

Italy to boost deficit to help car industry and furloughed workers, source says Link: /automakers/italy-boost-deficit-help-car-industry-and-furloughed-workers-source-says

Italy is preparing a 20 billion euro ($22.73 billion) stimulus package. The extra spending will involve additional borrowing and drive Italy's budget deficit to about 11.6 percent of national output from the 10.4 percent indicated in April.

Automakers lament no targeted aid in UK bailout Link: /automakers/automakers-lament-no-targeted-aid-uk-bailout

The British government's failure to provide specific support for automakers in its $37.6 billion package to help the economy get through the coronavirus has left the sector feeling vulnerable.
